member.name: D2D1_STROKE_STYLE_PROPERTIES1
member.summary: Describes the stroke that outlines a shape.

member.name: D2D1_STROKE_STYLE_PROPERTIES1.startCap
member.summary: The cap to use at the start of each open figure.

member.name: D2D1_STROKE_STYLE_PROPERTIES1.endCap
member.summary: The cap to use at the end of each open figure.

member.name: D2D1_STROKE_STYLE_PROPERTIES1.dashCap
member.summary: The cap to use at the start and end of each dash.

member.name: D2D1_STROKE_STYLE_PROPERTIES1.miterLimit
member.summary: The limit beyond which miters are either clamped or converted to bevels.

member.name: D2D1_STROKE_STYLE_PROPERTIES1.dashStyle
member.summary: The type of dash to use.

member.name: D2D1_STROKE_STYLE_PROPERTIES1.dashOffset
member.summary: The location of the first dash, relative to the start of the figure.

member.name: D2D1_STROKE_STYLE_PROPERTIES1.transformType
member.summary: The rule that determines what render target properties affect the nib of the stroke.
